description:
mime: remove ".wav" from tests (to fix build)

It looks like not all computers have
mime type for .wav extension.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM
On Nov 17, 2011 6:12 PM, <alex.brainman@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> mime: remove ".wav" from tests (to fix build)
>
> It looks like not all computers have
> mime type for .wav extension.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5415045/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5415045/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/mime/type_windows.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/mime/type_windows.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/mime/type_windows.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/mime/type_windows.go
> @@ -57,6 +57,5 @@
>        return map[string]string{
>                ".bmp": "image/bmp",
>                ".png": "image/png",
> -               ".wav": "audio/wav",
>        }
>  }
>
>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Lets hope it works now :-)

Alex

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d14520ac25bf ***
